Power_Bolt.help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.
Power_Bolt.targetHelp: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

messages.attackerHit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

Power_Blast.help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.
Power_Blast.targetHelp: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

Energy_Torrent.targetHelp: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

Power_Burst.help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow
Power_Burst.targetHelp: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

Explosive_Blast.help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.
Explosive_Blast.targetHelp: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

Nova.help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
Nova.shortHelp: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback, Self -Recovery

Healing_Aura.help: Healing Aura restores some Hit Points to you and all nearby heroes. Healing Aura is not as potent as Heal Other, but can heal multiple targets at once. Recharge: Moderate

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

Fulcrum_Shift.help: Fulcrum Shift drains the power of a targeted foe and all foes nearby, transferring it to all adjacent allies, the caster, and those near the caster. Affected foes will deal less damage, while your affected allies will deal more. The more foes that are affected, the more power your allies receive. Fulcrum Shift can dramatically turn the tide of a melee battle. Recharge: Long
Fulcrum_Shift.targetHelp: Your damage potential has been reduced.

Heal_Other.help: Heals a single targeted ally. You cannot use this power to heal yourself. Recharge: Fast

messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} heals you for {Damage} points of damage.

Mirror_Trap.help: Mirrors traps you in a cage without walls preventing you from defending yourself.
Mirror_Trap.targetHelp: Mirrors traps you in a cage without walls preventing you from defending yourself.

messages.attackerHit: You Hold {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName}.
messages.victimHit: {PlayerSource} Holds you with their {PowerName}.

Mirror_Shield.help: The Mirror Shield is almost impenetrable to all attacks, even Psionics and Enemy Teleportation, although attacks from more powerful foes may get through more easily. Mirror Shield will also reduce the damage of any attacks that do get through.
Mirror_Shield.attackerHit: Your {PowerName} makes you virtually invulnerable to most attacks, but you can only cast powers on yourself while the Force Field is active.

Teleport.help: Mirror Spirit can Teleport long distances.
Teleport.targetHelp: Mirror Spirit can Teleport long distances.
